name: @wp-graphql/subscriptions-sse-server
description: Minimal GraphQL-SSE subscription server for WPGraphQL real-time subscriptions

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:graphiql
scripts.redis:stop: docker stop wp-graphql-redis && docker rm wp-graphql-redis
scripts.dev:full: npm run redis:start && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.kill: lsof -ti:4000 | xargs -r kill -9 && pkill -f tsx || true
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill && npm run redis:stop || true
scripts.restart: npm run kill && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.restart:full: npm run kill:all && sleep 2 && npm run dev:full
scripts.status: echo '=== Port 4000 ===' && lsof -ti:4000 && echo '=== TSX Processes ===' && ps aux | grep tsx | grep -v grep && echo '=== Redis Container ===' && docker ps | grep wp-graphql-redis || echo 'No processes found'

author: WPGraphQL Team
